short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a verse of Quran with a beautiful background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a verse of the Holy Quran with a beautiful background (from unsplash.com) when you open a new tab.

More features coming soon ! 
- Hijri Calendar
- Hadith
- Prayer Timings
